content: गौरवं {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [गुरोभार्वः कर्म° वा अण्] Belonging to a Guru or teacher. --वं {@--1@} Weight, heaviness (<ab>lit.</ab>); जघन° <ls>Ś. 3. 8</ls>; सुरेंद्रमात्राश्रितगर्भगौरवात् <ls>R. 3. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Importance, high value or estimation; स्वविक्रमे गौरवमादधानं <ls>R. 14. 18</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 39</ls>; कार्यगौरवेण <ls>Mu. 5</ls>; importance or urgent nature; <ls>U. 6. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Respect, regard, consideration; तथापि यन्मय्यपि ते गुरुरित्यस्ति गौरवं <ls>Śi. 2. 71</ls>; प्रयोजनापेक्षितया प्रभूणां प्रायश्चलं गौरवमाश्रितेषु <ls>Ku. 3. 1</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 19.</ls> {@--4@} Respectability, dignity, venerableness; कोऽर्थी गतो गौरवं <ls>Pt. 1. 146</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 145.</ls> {@--5@} Cumbrousness. {@--6@} (In prosody) Length (as of a syllable). {@--7@} Depth (as of meaning); यच्चार्थतो गारैवं <ls>Māl. 1. 7.</ls>
